page.title: 13HEDGEROWS IN SHROPSHIRE
page.content:
There are many wonderful things hidden in the overgrown{hedgerows.}In spring many wild flowers can be seen, such as{stitchwort,dog violet, dead {nettle, ground ivy}and many others.The hedges are mainly hawthorn and hazel with patches of holly and brambles.In the late spring and summer, they become overgrown; most hedges are cut in late summer after harvest.
The hedges are home to many animals and birds.The{small tortoiseshell butterfly lays her eggs on the nettles and is often seen there.We often see holes in the hedge where foxes have made paths. Shropshire hedgerows are very interesting.{Why don't you {explore them ?
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
